name: Transfactorium
description:
You will taste the feel of producing enormously but not for just nothing. You wanted to fulfill your customer's wishes and then you will make yourself qualified to fulfill other customers' wishes.

CONTROLS & HOW TO PLAY:

Building:

You are going to sellect a building from Building menu. Then you can buy and place it on buildable tiles which is colored differently.

Creating Road:

Click R to open Road mode. After that, click on two different buildings you want to connect. You need vehicles to transport goods. In building menu, choose the vehicle and then click on a road you want it to have a vehicle.

Choosing A Contract:

You need to choose a contract from contract menu to gain money.

Lands:

If you need more space, you need to purcahse new lands from Lands menu.

Bank:

When you need cash at a time, you can take a loan from bank.

Press ESC to close this tab. If you want open it again, press "T".
